snippet: Rafael Nadal has been given the green light by the International Tennis Federation (ITF) to compete at next month's Rio Olympics despite not fulfilling the qualification criteria....
lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal has been given the green light by the International Tennis Federation (ITF) to compete at next month's Rio Olympics despite not fulfilling the qualification criteria.

headline.print_headline: Nadal Gets Green Light to Play at Rio Olympics
headline.main: Nadal Gets Green Light to Play at Rio Olympics
